dt-api.name: fixedHeader.enabled()

type.parameter: Get the enablement status of FixedHeader
type.returns: `true` if FixedHeader is enabled on this table. `false` otherwise.
type.description: Simply gets the status of FixedHeader for this table.

dt-api.description: As FixedHeader has the ability to dynamically be enabled and disabled, this method provides the ability to read the current state.
